name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DnD Brasil Cork - Foundry VTT Map Cleaner

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How to clean elements on Foundry VTT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a tool for cleaning some of the elements of the map, for a better streaming view of the content of the map.

This has a few functionalities, so it is more like a map cleaner and revert it back when is needed, also when you pop it out the chat, we can control how to filter the ammout of information that is being shown, so you can see more data if you need to stream separately the chat window.
